attributes.action: Force Theresa May to remain in power for the rest of her life.
attributes.background: Not only is Theresa May a great leader, but she’s also a fashion icon. Theresa May’s only fault was signing up for this job at the wrong time. She did her best and was let down by parliament. This country can not afford to lose this fashion icon for MPs’ incompetence.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments.
